artifactCards.text: You may look behind the screen of any one player of your choice.

Any one character of your choice immediately discards up to 3 Assassins or Thugs.
You may immediately take and use 2 Assassins for your character pool.
You may secretly look at the Role card of any one player of your choice.
Restore up to 3 HP to a character of your choice.
A player of your choice must immediately answer a yes or no question truthfully.
A character of your choise immediately loses 3 health.
Play this artifact together with an Assassin. For the remainder of this turn, that Assassin has a threat value of 5.
Discard any number of pieces which threaten you.
